Articles.Content:
Hi folks, first of all I'm kinda a huge noob to KSP but I I certainly enjoy plane building! ^.^

The following planes are intended to be used with the DB armory mod as soon as it will be updated to 1.0, but please do give me feedback!

[http://imgur.com/a/mpdPc#2fBtUkC](http://imgur.com/a/mpdPc#2fBtUkC)

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1983](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1983) - Fe-10 Interceptor

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1986](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1986) - Fo-100 Multi Purpose Bomber

You can embed pictures in the forum like this:

[noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mpdPc)

[/noparse]
Giving you this:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mpdPc)

Those planes look good, the landing gear on the first one could use some work, but it looks good.

Ah okay thanks for the tip! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Btw, I was having some trouble with the landing gears on the first plane, so that kinda was my final solution.
